src_original: krodhād ūrdhvaṃ mamānenedam apakṛtam ity etasya vairātmakasyāśayasyānubandho 'nutsargaḥ ,  prabandhena pravartanam upanāhaḥ /  akṣānti sanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /  akṣāntir apakārāmarṣaṇaṃ ,  pratyapakāracikīrṣety arthaḥ /  ayaṃ ca krodhavat pradveṣāvasthāviśeṣe prajñapyata iti prajñaptisan veditavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 而言覆者，謂於自作罪，恐失利譽，隱藏為性，能障不覆，悔惱為業。

src_original: chandadveṣabhayādīṃs tiraskṛtya kāle taddhitaiṣiṇā codakena tvam evaṅkārīty anuyuktasya mohāṃśiky avadyapracchādanā mrakṣaḥ /  mohāṃśikatvaṃ tu mrakṣasyāvacchādanākāratvāt /  kaukṛtyāsparśavihārasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /  dharmataiṣā yad avadyaṃ pracchādayataḥ kaukṛtyam /  kaukṛtyāc cāvaśyaṃ daurmanasyena samprayogād asparśavihāra iti //
tgt_original: 謂覆罪者，後必悔惱不安隱故。

src_original: caṇḍaṃ vacaḥ pragāḍhaṃ pāruṣyaṃ marmaghaṭṭanayogena /  daśanaśīlo dāśī /  tadbhāvo dāśitā /  ayaṃ ca bhāvapratyayaḥ svārthikaḥ /
tgt_original: 忿謂依對現前不饒益境憤發為性，能障不忿，執取為業。

src_original: ayaṃ ca krodhopanāhapūrvaṅgamaś cetasa āghātasvabhāva iti pratighāṃśika eveti na dravyato vidyate /  ayaṃ ca vāgduścaritaprasavanakarmako 'sparśavihārakarmakaś ca /
tgt_original: 恨謂由忿為先，懷惡不捨，結怨為性，能障不恨，熱惱為業。
謂結恨者不能貪忍，恒熱惱故。

src_original: ābhasatkārakulaśīlaśrutādīn guṇān upalabhya dveṣāṃśikaś cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā /  svam āśayaṃ vyāpya roṣo vyāroṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 嫉謂徇自名利，不耐他榮，妬忌為性，能障不嫉憂慼為業。

src_original: lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya jīvitopakaraṇeṣu rāgāṃśikaś cetasa āgraho 'parityāgecchā mātsaryam /  idaṃ cāsaṃlekhasanniśrayadānakarmakam /  asaṃlekhaḥ punar mātsaryeṇānupayujyamānānām apy upakaraṇānāṃ sannicayād veditavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 慳謂耽著財法不能惠捨，祕悋為性，能障不慳，鄙畜為業。 論慳悋者，心多鄙澁，畜積財法不能捨故。

src_original: [p. 67] māyā paravañcanāyā abhūtārthasandarśanā /  lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya paravañcanābhiprāyeṇānyathā vyavasthitasya śīlāder arthasyānyathā prakāśanā /  iyaṃ ca yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayate tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyate -- iti krodhādivat prajñaptita eva ,  na dravyataḥ /  mithyājīvasanniśrayadānakarmikā /  kāyavākkuhanopāttāḥ śayyāsanādaya upajīvyante ,  na ca vyāyāmalabdhā iti mithyājīva ucyate //
tgt_original: 誑謂為獲利譽矯現有德，詭詐為性，能障不誑，邪命為業。
